dc:title:
On Pilgrimage,
Foreword
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Introduces the book as "a woman's book, and for women," dealing "with things of concern to us all, the family, the home, how to live, and what to live and what we live by."
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 475 1948-01-02 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
